title: ContentType HTTP header
extract: The Content-Type entity header is used to indicate the media type of the resource. In responses, a Content-Type header tells the client what the content type of the returned content actually is. ... In requests, (such as POST or PUT ), the client tells the server what type of data is actually sent.Jan 11, 2019
